name: EpilepticHopper
description:
Epileptic Hopper is a high-score game intended for PC/Mobile platforms. The goal is to reach and beat your high-score by jumping from platforms. The "Epileptic" part of the title comes from the color changes of platforms by the beat of music.

The game is in really early stage right now and is open to ideas and feedback.

-Ideas to be added:

*Power-ups that can be purchased before round (Higher starting speed, skip first 100 points, Higher jump, skins and so on...)

*Currency system by picking floating coins (Leading player into making misstakes)

*Play the game with any song on your phone and watch the colors match the beats.

*Add more detailed background
